frontmatter.title: VTEX Design System
frontmatter.description: Styleguide was the company's Design System, the home for all our reusable patterns, components and assets related to product design in VTEX. It aimed to be a common language of tools and processes to facilitate how we collaborated and shared knowledge across teams and projects.
frontmatter.minibio: Developing a common language to align and scale product design solutions for the entire company, and beyond.
